title: Analyze Content Acquisition Deal
description: A streaming service is considering acquiring the rights to an older, popular TV show. An agent must analyze if the deal is worthwhile.

tasks.description: Estimate the potential viewership for the show based on social media interest and its performance on other platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent forecasts a potential audience of 2 million subscribers.

tasks.description: Model the potential impact on subscriber acquisition and retention.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model predicts the show could reduce churn by 0.5% over the next year.

tasks.description: Compare the projected revenue and retention benefits against the cost of the acquisition deal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a positive ROI for the deal and recommends proceeding.
